short.ar: يساعد ملحق فتاحة عناوين URL المجمعة على فتح عناوين URL متعددة بنقرة واحدة فقط.
short.am: የጅምላ ዩአርኤል መክፈቻ ቅጥያ በአንድ ጠቅታ ብዙ ዩአርኤል ለመክፈት ይረዳል።
short.bg: Разширението за групово отваряне на URL помага да отворите множество URL адреси само с едно кликване.
short.bn: বাল্ক ইউআরএল ওপেনার এক্সটেনশন শুধুমাত্র একক ক্লিকে একাধিক ইউআরএল খুলতে সাহায্য করে।
short.ca: L'extensió d'obridor d'URL a granel ajuda a obrir diversos URL amb un sol clic.
short.cs: Rozšíření hromadného otevírání adres URL pomáhá otevřít více adres URL jediným kliknutím.
short.da: Bulk URL Opener Extension hjælper med at åbne flere URL med et enkelt klik.
short.de: Die Bulk-URL-Opener-Erweiterung hilft beim Öffnen mehrerer URLs mit nur einem Klick.
short.el: Η επέκταση ανοίγματος μαζικής διεύθυνσης URL βοηθά στο άνοιγμα πολλών διευθύνσεων URL με ένα μόνο κλικ.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Bulk URL Opener Extension Helps To Open Multiple URL In Just Single Click.
short.es,es_419: La extensión de apertura de URL masiva ayuda a abrir varias URL con un solo clic.
short.et: URL-i hulgiavamise laiendus aitab avada mitu URL-i vaid ühe klõpsuga.
short.fa: پسوند بازکننده URL انبوه به باز کردن چندین URL تنها با یک کلیک کمک می کند.
short.fi: Bulk URL Opener Extension auttaa avaamaan useita URL-osoitteita yhdellä napsautuksella.
short.fil: Ang Bulk URL Opener Extension ay Tumutulong Upang Magbukas ng Maramihang URL Sa Isang Pag-click Lamang.
short.fr: L’extension d’ouverture d’URL en bloc permet d’ouvrir plusieurs URL en un seul clic.
short.gu: જથ્થાબંધ URL ઓપનર એક્સ્ટેંશન ફક્ત એક ક્લિકમાં બહુવિધ URL ખોલવામાં મદદ કરે છે.
short.he: הרחבה לפתיחת כתובות URL בכמות גדולה עוזרת לפתוח מספר כתובות אתרים בלחיצה אחת בלבד.
short.hi: बल्क यूआरएल ओपनर एक्सटेंशन केवल एक क्लिक में एकाधिक यूआरएल खोलने में मदद करता है।
short.hr: Proširenje Bulk URL Opener pomaže otvoriti više URL-ova u samo jednom kliku.
short.hu: A tömeges URL-nyitó bővítmény segít több URL megnyitásában egyetlen kattintással.
short.id: Ekstensi Pembuka URL Massal Membantu Membuka Banyak URL Hanya Dalam Satu Klik.
short.it: L'estensione di apertura URL in blocco aiuta ad aprire più URL con un solo clic.
short.ja: Bulk URL Opener 拡張機能を使用すると、ワンクリックで複数の URL を開くことができます。
short.kn: ಬಲ್ಕ್ URL ಓಪನರ್ ವಿಸ್ತರಣೆಯು ಒಂದೇ ಕ್ಲಿಕ್‌ನಲ್ಲಿ ಬಹು URL ಅನ್ನು ತೆರೆಯಲು ಸಹಾಯ ಮಾಡುತ್ತದೆ.
short.ko: 대량 URL 오프너 확장은 단 한 번의 클릭으로 여러 URL을 여는 데 도움이 됩니다.
short.lt: Masinis URL atidarymo plėtinys padeda atidaryti kelis URL vienu paspaudimu.
short.lv: Lielapjoma URL atvērēja paplašinājums palīdz atvērt vairākus URL ar vienu klikšķi.
short.ml: ബൾക്ക് URL ഓപ്പണർ എക്സ്റ്റൻഷൻ ഒറ്റ ക്ലിക്കിൽ ഒന്നിലധികം URL തുറക്കാൻ സഹായിക്കുന്നു.
short.mr: बल्क URL ओपनर एक्स्टेंशन फक्त एका क्लिकमध्ये एकाधिक URL उघडण्यास मदत करते.
short.ms: Sambungan Pembuka URL Pukal Membantu Membuka Berbilang URL Hanya Dalam Satu Klik.
short.nl: Bulk URL Opener-extensie helpt om meerdere URL's te openen met slechts één klik.
short.no: Bulk URL Opener-utvidelse hjelper til med å åpne flere URL-er med bare ett klikk.
short.pl: Rozszerzenie zbiorczego otwieracza adresów URL pomaga otworzyć wiele adresów URL jednym kliknięciem.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: A extensão Bulk URL Opener ajuda a abrir vários URLs com apenas um clique.
short.ro: Extensia de deschidere a adreselor URL în bloc vă ajută să deschideți mai multe adrese URL cu un singur clic.
short.ru: Расширение массового открытия URL-адресов помогает открыть несколько URL-адресов одним щелчком мыши.
short.sk: Rozšírenie na hromadné otváranie adries URL pomáha otvoriť viacero adries URL jediným kliknutím.
short.sl: Razširitev Bulk URL Opener Extension pomaga odpreti več URL-jev z enim klikom.
short.sr: Проширење за отварање више УРЛ-ова помаже да се отвори више УРЛ-ова само једним кликом.
short.sv: Bulk URL Opener Extension hjälper till att öppna flera webbadresser med bara ett klick.
short.sw: Kiendelezi cha Kifungua Kifungu cha URL Husaidia Kufungua URL Nyingi Katika Mbofyo Mmoja Tu.
short.ta: ஒரே கிளிக்கில் பல URLகளைத் திறக்க மொத்த URL ஓப்பனர் நீட்டிப்பு உதவுகிறது.
short.te: బల్క్ URL ఓపెనర్ పొడిగింపు కేవలం ఒకే క్లిక్‌లో బహుళ URLలను తెరవడానికి సహాయపడుతుంది.
short.th: ส่วนขยายตัวเปิด URL จำนวนมากช่วยในการเปิด URL หลายรายการด้วยการคลิกเพียงครั้งเดียว
short.tr: Toplu URL Açıcı Uzantısı, Tek Tıklamayla Birden Çok URL Açmaya Yardımcı Olur.
short.uk: Розширення Bulk URL Opener Extension допомагає відкривати кілька URL-адрес лише одним клацанням миші.
short.vi: Tiện ích mở rộng URL hàng loạt giúp mở nhiều URL chỉ bằng một cú nhấp chuột.
short.zh_CN,zh_TW: 批量 URL 打开器扩展有助于只需单击一次即可打开多个 URL。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Bulk URL Opener Extension allows users to Open Multiple URL’s at once with one click with many features to manage urls.

You may create, store and load lists of urls that you use. Quick and easy way to manage multiple or bulk urls.

FEATURES OF BULK URL OPENER EXTENSION:

    - Open Multiple Links (New Tabs Or Windows)
    - Quick And Easy Management
    - Get List Of Currently Open Tabs
    - Clear, Edit And Delete List Of Links
    - Secure To Use

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS OF BULK URL OPENER:

1. Click on “Add to Chrome” button.
2. Then, click on “Add Extension” button prompted on screen.
3. Click on “Puzzle” icon on right hand side of Chrome bar.
4. Pin the extension as it should be blue pin in front of the extension name “URL Opener”.
5. Click on extension icon from top to manage everything. 

This extension doesn't collect any data. You can use this extension hassle-free as we never save any details.
long.en,en_AU:
Bulk URL Opener Extension allows users to Open Multiple URL’s at once with one click with many features to manage urls.

You may create, store and load lists of urls that you use. Quick and easy way to manage multiple or bulk urls.

FEATURES OF BULK URL OPENER EXTENSION:

    - Open Multiple Links (New Tabs Or Windows)
    - Quick And Easy Management
    - Get List Of Currently Open Tabs
    - Clear, Edit And Delete List Of Links
    - Secure To Use

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS OF BULK URL OPENER:

1. Click on “Add to Chrome” button.
2. Then, click on “Add Extension” button prompted on screen.
3. Click on “Puzzle” icon on right hand side of Chrome bar.
4. Pin the extension as it should be blue pin in front of the extension name “URL Opener”.
5. Click on extension icon from top to manage everything. 

This extension doesn't collect any data. You can use this extension hassle-free as we never save any details.

Disclosure/Consent:

URL Opener enhances your browsing experience by providing useful features and participating in affiliate programs. This helps sustain the service without affecting the cost of your purchases. Explicit consent is required before any affiliate code is applied, and you have full control over this feature. Learn more in our Privacy Policy (https://www.openerurl.com/privacy-policy/), Terms of Use (https://www.openerurl.com/terms-of-use/), and Affiliate Disclosure (https://www.openerurl.com/affiliate-disclosure/).

Thank you for choosing URL Opener. We are committed to continually improving your online experience.
